lines.text: What are watching this rubbish for? Sports Report's on the other side
So it's a corner to Chelsea. Hollins to Cooke to Osgood; across the goalmouth to Tambling... and it's a goal! A great goal to Chelsea... goal to Chelsea!
...Chelsea had left it too late; though they piled on the pressure...
Would you believe it, eh? Getting done by a bunch of slags.
Come on love, isn't it time she went to school?
Oh-eh, Chelsea's buying a new winger! About time they spent a few bob.
